```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(p8105.datasets)
set.seed(1)
```

## Generate a relevant example

```{r}
n_samp = 250

sim_df_const = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(n_samp, 1, 1),
    error = rnorm(n_samp, 0, 1),
    y = 2 + 3 * x + error
  )

sim_df_nonconst = 
  sim_df_const |> 
  mutate(
    error = error * 0.75 * x,
    y = 2 + 3 * x + error 
  )

sim_df_const |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()

sim_df_nonconst |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point()
```

fit some linear models

```{r}
sim_df_nonconst |> 
  lm(y ~ x, data = _) |> 
  broom::tidy()
```
